title: Extent to which the Revolution represented change

content.question: Analyze the extent to which the American Revolution represented a radical alteration in American political ideas and institutions. Confine your answer to the period of 1775 to 1800.

frqParts.text: Analyze the extent to which the American Revolution represented a radical alteration in American political ideas and institutions. Confine your answer to the period of 1775 to 1800.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
